fected by congenital mirror movement disorder ?,Congenital mirror movement disorder is a very rare disorder. Its prevalence is thought to be less than 1 in 1 million. Researchers suggest that some mildly affected individuals may never be diagnosed.,GHR,congenital mirror movement disorder
